revisions.rev:
'''Herrmann & Kleine''' was a [[plinkerpop]] duo that formed circa [[1997]] and featured veteran [[DJ]] [[Christian Kleine]] and [[City Centre Offices]] label manager, [[Thaddi Herrmann]]. In addition to releasing a pair of [[Extended play|EP]] recordings, the duo also provided remixes to tracks by various notable bands, including [[His Name Is Alive]] and [[Bomb the Bass]]. They also shared stages with the likes of [[Lali Puna]]. It was disbanded in 2005.
Their sole full-length recording ''[[Our Noise]]'' saw release on April 2, 2002 via the [[Morr Music]] label.
==Discography== ===Albums=== * ''[[Our Noise]]'' (2002)
===Singles/EPs=== * "Kickboard Girl" (2000) * "Transalpin"
